channel.title: iScrape Pk Released! [Sunday, September 26, 2010]
channel.description:
[size=18pt]My Development![/size] This is what I have done, please don't flame me or post negative comments. Completed, Processing, Unfinished! - New Home. - New Premium Area. - Added Premium Shop(s). - Removed Teleports. - Farming Fixed! - Mage Of Zamorak is your transportation. [Added Everywhere] - Vampire takes you to slayer tower. - Sailor takes you to God Wars. [Will be reconstructed in a new area, dividing both NPC's] - Added/Removed Commands! - Added Spawning Rights To Character Files! [0, 1] I get to choose who spawns Regular Players, Members, Staff! :P - Fixing Dupes [Arrow/Trade and Alchemy] - Npc/Player Clipping [size=12pt][i][b]iScrape Points![/b][/i][/size] ISP is obtained by killing NPC's, All NPC's are everywhere. The higher the level the more points. When you are even training your combat on the monster you get ISP Per Level Trained. Isp is a great way to get great items, it isn't that hard and it isn't that easy. All it takes is dedication, and As well ISP is included per skill level. More updates will be added! Some Old Pictures! Old Home! [img]http://i54.tinypic.com/2mfkyee.png[/img] Premium! [img]http://i53.tinypic.com/5djm15.png[/img] Shops! [img]http://img695.imageshack.us/img695/2628/mtp8.png[/img] [img]http://img178.imageshack.us/img178/6758/mtp9.png[/img] Npc Dialogue/Player Teleport! [img]http://i54.tinypic.com/wsr9k6.png[/img] Lunar Spells Tab! [img]http://img15.imageshack.us/img15/9762/lunar.png[/img] Vengeance Emote [Just Missing Skull] [img]http://i55.tinypic.com/oj2d08.png[/img] ISP Shop/Prices! [img]http://i51.tinypic.com/23abro.png[/img] Level 4 Wild Instantly [Edgeville] [img]http://i56.tinypic.com/2jaf9fl.png[/img] Pking [MB] [img]http://i51.tinypic.com/33x7ksp.png[/img] Prayer! [img]http://img840.imageshack.us/img840/4413/mtp6.png[/img] Those are just a few pictures of what has been done, still lots of things to be done. I hope you enjoyed the development thread. [size=14pt]These are the new commands! [/size] [code] ::pure ::master ::rebirth ::level ::setlevel ::changepassword ::help ::info ::givemems ::givemod ::giveadmin ::giveowner ::givespawn ::demote ::report ::suggest ::kick ::mute [Fixed] ::ipmute [Fixed] ::yell [Added Ranks] For Donators For Premium For Owners For Moderators For Admistrators For Head Mods For Head Admins[/code] Thank you for taking your time, to preview this thread. [size=15pt] Server Download Packaged:[url=http://www.mediafire.com/?ukkv6q7doylxdcc]Click Here [/url][Server] [size=15pt] Client Download Packaged: [url=http://www.Isisle.tk]Click Here [/url][Client] [u]Both .rar files.[/u]
If you do not have Winrar go to www.Google.ca Search for "Winrar" or you can go to www.Rarlab.com
[size=4pt]Credits: 35% Sanity 35% Exion 30% Encryption [quote="Encryption"][quote author=Boss Of Weed link=topic=458249.msg3353459#msg3353459 date=1285549926] More information about the server and credits please. EDIT: client may be a virus. [/quote] No its not a virus and here's the .rar link. http://www.mediafire.com/?dpz9j8sz8x4uzs1[/quote]

item.title: iScrape Pk Released! [Sunday, September 26, 2010]
item.dc:creator: @Encryption Encryption
item.description:
@Encryption wrote:

marcbob:

No credits to me?

I just used to pictures off you that’s all, just too show the similar items that is all. I never used or touched your base. I apologize if you get offended, I used a Exion base, Exion Used P.I, so therefor that whom I got it from.

Credits for pictures yes, just don’t know how much lol.

[quote=“RspsMania, post:29, topic:361973”]Heh alright thanks Encryption! but i did end up finding the answer for the 2nd question alone, however, i am thankful that you answered my second question mainly because this was one of the best bases ive seen yet! anyway thanks for responding.
Also i made a costom amulet with an unknown id (iknow it they dont :D) with 20k damage ;]

QUESTION
heh another question… u have no “Autospawn.cfg” so i cant modify the Mage of zammy to go to the new home. Any advice will be most appreciated! Tanksss

RspsMania[/quote]

Nor for you, I want you to look in the “Data” Folder. In the Data folder click on the “CFG” Folder.
In the cfg folder there will be a file called “auto-spawn.cfg” Double click the file and “Ctrl+F”

spawn = 2258

Read full topic

item.title: iScrape Pk Released! [Sunday, September 26, 2010]
item.dc:creator: @Encryption Encryption
item.description:
@Encryption wrote:

DdosScape:

Exactly the same donator and pkp shop?Comprende?

Just a picture here’s 0.01 %

Lazy to take one of what my pk and donation shop have in them. There similar though.

No it is Exion based.

[quote=“RspsMania, post:21, topic:361973”]Hey, i extreemly admire you creativity and fairness… this is one of the BEST servers on moparscape i have ever played! YOU are the best coder (in my opinion). 10/10 FANTASTIC I WISH I COULD REP!

However there are a couple things i would like.
mainly i dont want my future admins and mods in pk… mainly due to abuse… so i want to ask one thing… how may i prevent my item loss on death? i understand i could obviouslly make an owner item with +20,000 but then if a staff member found he could abuse. And secondly, i cant find out how to modify my home teleport. Usually you could just go to “clicking.most.java” but it isnt provided. Please Reply && Pm im constantly online.

RspsMania[/quote]

Go to config.java

Than Look For or “Ctrl+F” Admin_Trade, Admin_Drop, Mod_trade, Mod_Drop.
Logg in and do ::mypos find the Coordinates of where you are being teleported to.
Z-File Search The Coords and change them, easy as pie.

Staff item that can hit 20k Plus, use a rare type of ring, something player won’t use or like.

Read full topic
